markdownRemark.html:
I always forget how to bring up the Emoji keyboard, so here's that command:

Command-Control-Space (source)

If you haven't had enough of emojis, though, this article from @holman is frickin' awesome: Abusing Emoji in iOS and Your Mac

frontmatter.title: Emojis!
